data.title: Obituaries - Seawright Funeral Homes
data.meta_description: Seawright Funeral Home and Crematory has been providing funeral services for over 90 years.Look up your loved ones' obituaries online & leave a lasting tribute.
data.text:
Patricia Annette Ravan

Oct 27, 1954 - Aug 12, 2024

Patricia Annette Ravan, 69, of 12 West Clark Road, Inman, passed away Monday, August 12, 2024 at her residence. Patricia was born in Spartanburg on October 27, 1954, a daughter of the late Hazel Cothran Ravan and James J. Ravan, Jr.She was a homemaker and a member of New Pilgrim Baptist Church in Campobello.She is survived…

Katherine Ann Settle

Apr 24, 1941 - Aug 11, 2024

Katherine "Kay" Ann Settle, 83, of Wellford, South Carolina, passed away on Sunday, August 11, 2024. Born in Omaha, Nebraska on April 24, 1941, she was a daughter of the late Kay (Banik) Nechodom and James T. Keohane and her stepmother, Virginia Spivey Keohane and was the wife of John Eddie Settle having celebrated 53…

Dennis Lee Turocy

Jan 17, 1950 - Aug 9, 2024

Dennis Lee Turocy, 74, of Inman, SC, passed away Friday, August 9, 2024 at his residence. Dennis was born in Stowe, Ohio on January 17, 1950, a son of the late Olga (Koscelnik) Turocy and Andrew S Turocy, Jr. Dennis's family immigrated from Hungary to the United States through Ellis Island. Their family is very…

Donald Richard "Poppie" Rogers

Nov 19, 1946 - Aug 7, 2024

Donald Richard "Poppie" Rogers, 77, of Campobello, South Carolina, passed away on Wednesday, August 7, 2024 at his home. Born in Spartanburg, South Carolina on November 19, 1946, he was the son of the late William Wilson Rogers and Frances Elizabeth Bradley Rogers. He was the loving husband of Brenda Coates Rogers having celebrated 58 years…

Anita Kay Blake

Dec 19, 1972 - Aug 6, 2024

Anita Kay Blake, 51, of Inman, South Carolina, passed away on Tuesday, August 6, 2024 at Spartanburg Medical Center.Born in Spartanburg, South Carolina on December 19, 1972, she was a daughter of Ruth (Tucker) Blake and the late Kenneth Blake, Sr. In addition to her mother, she is also survived by seven sons, Travis Henderson (Chrysteena),…

Elsie Mae McDowell Poteat

Oct 2, 1934 - Aug 6, 2024

Elsie Mae Poteat, 89, of Miller Farm Road in Inman, passed away Tuesday, August 6th, 2024 at Spartanburg Medical Center. Mrs. Poteat was born in Inman on October 2, 1934, a daughter of the late Almina Corn McDowell and Joseph Lamar McDowell. She was the widow of Horace Poteat Jr.She enjoyed working in the lunchroom at…

Guinn Wayne Elmore

Dec 15, 1943 - Aug 5, 2024

Guinn "Wayne" Elmore, 80, of Inman, South Carolina, passed away on Monday, August 5, 2024 at the Spartanburg Regional Hospice Home.Born in Gaffney, South Carolina on December 15, 1943, he was the son of the late Calvin George Smalley and Ola Bell Peeler Smalley. Wayne was member of Covenant United Methodist Church and was employed with…

Dorothy Carter Koob

Jan 10, 1923 - Jul 28, 2024

Dorothy Carter Koob was born January 10, 1923, in rural Iowa, and died July 28, 2024 in Boiling Springs, South Carolina.Dorothy grew up on a farm with her parents and siblings near North English, Iowa. She attended and graduated from Parnell School. Dorothy met her future husband, Leonard, the summer before she graduated high school.…

Dr. Terry S. McMillian

Mar 5, 1939 - Jul 27, 2024

Dr. McMillian, 85, went home to be with his Lord and Savior on July 27, 2024. He was born on March 5, 1939, in Lynn, North Carolina, to the late William S. and Edith Lynch McMillian. He was preceded in death by his sister, Nancy M. Robinson.Having a love for flying, he served in the…

Laura Ann Belcher Odom

Sep 2, 1932 - Jul 25, 2024

Following a brief illness, Mrs. Laura Ann Belcher Odom passed away at her home on Thursday, July 25, 2024. A native of Spartanburg County, SC, she was the daughter of Elias Leroy and Mabel Wingo Belcher, who preceded her in death. Mrs. Odom’s husband, Clifford C. Odom, also preceded her death. Mrs. Odom was a…
